item.title: Host Website From Own Machine
item.description: Introduction I’ve been using real ip for a while now and wanted to host a website from my ip address. It was easy and here’s how I did it. Steps Setup nginx Install and enable nginx: sudo pacman -S nginx sudo systemctl enable nginx sudo systemctl start --now nginx Get IP Address Run this to get the ip address of your device on your local network. ip addr show INTERFACE_NAME | grep inet | awk '{ print $2; }' | sed 's/\/.
